reviews.review_msg: never had a prof be as mean as perkins. worst crim class ive had. gpa killer.

I have taken her before and she is a fantastic prof for 300 level classes. Make sure to put effort into her papers and ask for guidance because she will truly help. There is large research paper in this class, so be prepared to put your life on hold for at least a week. Her exams are fair, if you have have studied. Overall, awesome prof
